channel.title: How do i upload a pictures
channel.description: hi can i ask how do i upload a pictures that only have the picture of the client.

item.title: How do i upload a pictures
item.dc:creator: @GodsChaos GodsChaos
item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

not too sure what you are asking but ill try to help.

1.) When u find something you want to take a picture of, hit the printscreen key on your keyboard.
2.) Now open up paint or photoshop or w.e and paste it.
3.) From there you can edit it, then save it
4.) Now open up a web browser and go to www.photobucket.com and upload the picture you just saved.
5.) when its uploaded there should be codes under the picture, look for one that says IMG code, all you gotta do it copy and paste that code where ever you wanna post that pic.

Also, some forums will require you to use the HTML code instead of IMG, just copy & paste that one instead :]

Hope it helped

Read full topic

item.title: How do i upload a pictures
item.dc:creator: @God3 God®
item.description:
@God3 wrote:

What do you mean, your question doesn’t make much sense…

This is what I think you mean.

  1. You can open photoshop, or some type or picture editing program.
  2. Open your client folder and look for your background image. JPG.file
  3. Now double click that and it will be layed out on your program.
  4. Start editing. Also for Photoshop users, I reccomend Adobe Photoshop CS3 (But any shall work)

Read full topic
